title: Ladukio Song Lyrics Saithan
stanzas:
ladu ladu ladu ladukio
ladu ladu ladu ladukio
ladu lucky-o ladu lucky-o
ladukio ladukio

naan suda suda nanaigiren
nee thoda thoda kalaigiren
urugugiren marugugiren
unnidam tholaigiren

en uyirin uyiraaga
ennakkul vandhu niraindhai
en kadalin thuliyaaga
enakkul kalanthaaye

un pagalil nizhalaga
dhinam dhinam naanum varuvene
un iravil nerupaga
unnai suduvene

naan suda suda nanaigiren
nee thoda thoda kalaigiren
urugugiren marugugiren
unnidam tholaigiren

ladu ladu ladu ladukio
ladu ladu ladu ladukio
ladu lucky-o ladu lucky-o
ladukio ladukio

pidithaval arugil irukkumbothu
edhuvukm pidikavillai
un ullam kaigal
thalaiyanai aagudhu
urakkam varudhum illai

en peyar solli yaarum alaithaal
thirumbi paarpathillai
un perai sonnal
thirumbum kaluthai
thadukka mudiyavillai
en virupam
adhu un nerukkam
verondrum thevai illai
nee arugil irundhaal podhum
vizhi thiraiyil
thiraipadamaai un uruvam
oaduthu anbe
ennai pirindhuvidathe neeyum

ladu ladu ladu ladukio
ladu ladu ladu ladukio
ladu lucky-o ladu lucky-o
ladukio ladukio

naan suda suda nanaigiren
nee thoda thoda kalaigiren
urugugiren marugugiren
unnidam tholaigiren

naan thoongum velai kooda
undhan nyabagam urangavillai
en oru nodi kooda vizhigalai vittu
un mugam kalaiyavillai
un kan imai
naduvil vaazhndhidum bothu
kavalaigal yedhum illai

en kai thodum thooram
nee irumbothum
kadavulum thevai illai
en vizhiyil ini un kanavil
naam inge veru illai

nee kulithaal enakkum eeram
mulu iravul
maru pagal muzhuthum
piriyaamal vaazha vendum
un piriyam mattum podhum

ladu ladu ladu ladukio
ladu ladu ladu ladukio
ladu lucky-o ladu lucky-o
ladukio ladukio

naan suda suda nanaigiren
nee thoda thoda karaigiren
urugugiren marugugiren
unnidam tholaigiren

en uyirin uyiraga
ennakkul vandhu niraindhai
en kadalin thuliyaga
enakkul kalanthaye

un pagalil nilalaga
dhinam dhinam naanum varuvene
un iravil nerupaaga
unnai suduvene
